content: need an easy way to dress up for valentine s day this scrunchie can be worked up quickly and the dangly tassels make for a fun look you can add as many tassels as you would like and customize the length to fit your hair make with either worsted weight #4 yarn or light worsted #3 yarn it works up great with both but using #4 yarn will make it slightly bigger and stiffer enjoy your new valentine s scrunchie connect with me here 1 i do not charge for my patterns but if you would like to support my work you can tip me on venmo @thoseyellowthings 1 https //www flowcode com/page/thoseyellowthings
